description: Hon. Attorney General Vs Wickeremathilake Don Susantha Kumara before HON. WICKUM A. KALUARACHCHI, J
parties: Hon. Attorney General Vs Wickeremathilake Don Susantha Kumara
keywords: Scope of section 200 (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act. Requirements to call for a defence. Proving lack of consent in a sexual offence. Ingredients of the offence of sexual harassment.
legistation: Sections 345 of the penal code. Section 200 (1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act. Section 9 (2) (b) of the Judicature Act.
